subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
Softball
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rotblatt appeared in only 35 major league games, but a small college memorialized him with an annual softball game that now lasts nearly 150 innings.
snippet: Mr. Rotblatt appeared in only 35 major league games, but a small college memorialized him with an annual softball game that now lasts nearly 150 innings.
